TopicTitle: Request for anti-aliasing that does not blur textures

Articles.Content: Please can we get any form of anti-aliasing that does not blur textures as is the case with anything related to TAA? I am personally hoping for SMAA. I realize that most people can look past a bit of blurriness but I get headaches from blurry graphics so currently I just turn off the anti-aliasing completely.

+1. 

My solution to the not-so-great AA was to buy a bigger display and disable AA.
I suppose from the point of view of the old display that's technically supersampling.
